import "./navbar.scss"; import { ArrowDropDown, Notifications, Search } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Navbar() { const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false); window.onscroll = () => { setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true); return () => (window.onscroll = null); }; return (

); } export default Navbar;
